titles.title: Crow Creek Sioux Tribe Infrastructure Development Trust Fund Act of 1995
Crow Creek Sioux Tribe Infrastructure Development Trust Fund Act of 1996
Crow Creek Sioux Tribe Infrastructure Development Trust Fund Act of 1996
Crow Creek Sioux Tribe Infrastructure Development Trust Fund Act of 1996
To provide for certain benefits of the Missouri River basin Pick-Sloan project to the Crow Creek Sioux Tribe, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Native American and Insular Affairs.
Executive Comment Requested from HHS, Interior, Treasury.
Joint Hearings Held by the Subcommittee on Native American and Insular Affairs and by the Senate Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources Discharged.
Subcommittee on Native American and Insular Affairs Discharged.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 104-765.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 410.

action.text: Mr. Gallegly moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.

calendar.text: Received in the Senate. Read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 587.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 9/10/1996--Passed House amended. Crow Creek Sioux Tribe Infrastructure Development Trust Fund Act of 1996 - Establishes in the Treasury the Crow Creek Sioux Tribe Infrastructure Development Trust Fund, which shall: (1) receive funds from the Missouri River basin Pick-Sloan program until a specified Fund aggregate is attained; and (2) be used for the socioeconomic recovery and cultural preservation of the Crow Creek Sioux Tribe (based upon a Tribe-developed plan). Authorizes appropriations.
